content: **pattern is in british terms** this pattern makes both a boot version and a mary jane version of the shoe gauge on foot section from the top of one ridge to the top of the 3rd ridge above it measuring 4 ridge lines is 2 2cm 10 stitches is 4 5cm gauge on sock section unstretched 5 row which will look like three lines of vs is 1cm 10 stitches is 3 5cm fits foot approx 14 cm long there is also an adult size eu 42 us 10 26cm modification now available there are 2 intermediate/difficult maneuvers/stitches in this pattern special join and close the gap
